experience.title: Student Assistant
description: Implemented and documented a full design system consisting of several dozen user interface components from Figma design specifications using React, Typescript, Vite, and SCSS.

experience.title: Research Assistant
description: Implemented parallelized random sampling on Linux systems, allowing an up to 16 times decrease in runtime.
Decreased build times by 25% by eliminating redundancy and optimizing the Makefile.
Developed in-house hosted web frontends for research applications using React and Express.

experience.title: Summer Technology Intern

description: Configured and repaired private networks systems components, such as switches, firewalls, and routers, allowing for faster communications and network connection in three new buildings.

experience.title: Engineering Intern
